sourceDesc.p: HEAP TEPEE TALK By Smoke Signal Red Cloud

body.p: Black River Falls may be one hunÂ­dred years old but is a whole lot sprier than a lot of towns fifty years younger. Splendid and wholehearted cooperation of all fraternal organizations and of the people made the centennial and homecoming the happiest gathering of all Jackson county people and for all who came from afar to celebrate with us. To my notion the man who had the happiest and most enjoyable time at the centennial gathering was Marshall H. Finney of Melrose, who participated in all the Indian dances at the Indian Village, even doing the Calumet dance, the dance of competition of the American Indian. I sure did hate to be in the shoes on the man in the moon while the fireworks were going on. .
